member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler.OnStoryboardStatusChanged
member.summary: Handles events that occur when a storyboard's status changes.
member.param: The storyboard whose status has changed.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler.OnStoryboardUpdated
member.summary: Handles events that occur when a storyboard is updated.
member.param: The storyboard that has been updated.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler
member.summary: Defines methods for handling status and update events for a storyboard.
